WorkCoaching.name: WorkCoaching
WorkCoaching.description: Represents a single coaching relationship between two users. One of the users is defined as the coach and the other is defined as a coachee. WorkCoaching is feed-enabled so there is a private feed available to the coach and coachee.

CoachId.description: [Required] The coach in this 1:1 coaching relationship.

CoachedId.description: [Required] The user being coached in this 1:1 coaching relationship.

IsInactive.description: Indicates whether the coaching relationship is Inactive (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed a record that is related to this coaching relationship.

LastViewedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed this coaching relationship. If this value is null, this record might have been only referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: [Required] The recordâ€™s name. Max length is 255 characters.

OwnerId.description: ID of the contact who owns the WorkCoaching record.
